channel.title: Runescape NOCLIP&God mode
channel.description:
IDK if everyone knows what noclip is so I'll explain it. Noclip is a commonly used command in games that allows you to go through everything and fly around.
For runescape there might be a noclip command that developers use when they edit the game. On a sever that I play I know a glitch where I can walk through walls and stuff but my screen is black and I can only stay in a certain area. If we could make a command that makes no-collision that would be noclip without the flying. I haven't coded anything so I don't know about this, Can't you just disable all the walls and barriers?
For God mode can you just make a command that would give you like 999999999999 health when you use that command. Like ::God Mode"on" 9999999999hp ::God Mode"off"89hp
Well just some ideas reply and dont call me a noob. :)

item.title: Runescape NOCLIP&God mode
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

he wants a ::noclip command with out the floating emote and a ::god command that gives inf. health.

as for the noclip command it requires editing the client + Server.

and the god command

        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 2) {
            playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
            sendMessage("God mode on");
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 2) {
            sendMessage("god mode off");
            playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        }

Read full topic
